title: Weekly Wrap: A Jobs Crisis, And It's No One's Fault
description: The coronavirus is taking a toll on jobs and the economy. Sam talks to NPR's Cardiff Garcia and Stacey Vanek Smith, co-hosts of The Indicator from Planet Money, about ways to get people paid while they're out of work and the necessity for businesses to pivot to stay afloat. Also, Sam and NPR music news editor Sidney Madden talk about new ways people are listening to music and partying online in "club quarantine."

itunes:summary: Sam talks to NPR's Cardiff Garcia and Stacey Vanek Smith about the impact of the coronavirus on the economy.
